amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Watershed Rehabilition Program by $15,000,000 and applying the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Watershed Rehabilition Program by $15,000,000 and applying the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A017) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A017) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
